entry.title: welcome
entry.content:
Hello, this is my update journal, just a little jekyll blog where I can post updates on the various projects I enjoy participating in, not all of which are code related. I will tag all posts properly, whether they deal with code, writing, or whatever else.

Now I’m not the worlds best blogger, in fact, I forget I even had a blog more often than not! I suppose I’ll try with this one, however, it shouldn’t be so hard, since all the files for this blog are right here on my hard drive.

Anyways, I suppose I should leave off for now, the dog needs to go out, so I’ll post again later… maybe….
